name: Bee Game (Netal) (Netal)
description:
The browser version has some weird audio bugs, play the windows version if you can!

A bee vigilante causes tonnes of property damage in this climate change related rougelike-ish game!

Pollinate as much of the area as possible whilst destroying all the factories that stand in your way with your private apiarian army.

Bring life to a scorched desert with a solar-powered gimmick, and watch out for nuclear power plants with their electrocuting wires!

Join our Discord Server for news, devlogs, and early access to future games!

Controls
  • WASD / LeftJoystick - Move Queen Bee
  • Mouse / Right Joystick - Swarm Target
  • Space / Ⓐ / Shoulder Buttons - Dash
  • Escape / Start - Pause
Credits

A Netal game:

Coding, Art, SFX - Nettakrim 
Music, Art, SFX - The Other Guy
Playtesting - Walex
Font - Coffee Mood

you can play the objectively worse Game Jam version at netal.itch.io/bee-game-old
